John Deere 4WD tractor
I was excited to see another farm entry appear on the LEGO landscape and was intrigued to see that it was constructed with technic parts.
column2: I earmarked this set and happened to find it on discount at the local grocery (Meijer) at 15% off.&nbsp
column3: Having grown up in the country, with both a father, grandfather and neighbor, who all farmed the land around us, I was definitely going to pick up this set.

column1: The build was relatively easy, but complicated enough that it was entertaining to build.
column2: I would imagine that most kids over 8 would get a kick out of this set and would be a nice intro to the technic world of LEGO.&nbsp
column3: It delivers an accurate shape and color for the subject matter of a bright green and yellow John Deere machine!&nbsp
column4: I love the giant tractor tires with the yellow rims - that really makes this set stand out.&nbsp

column1: It comes with an average size sticker sheet, mostly for the JD branding on the wagon and on the tractor.
column2: A large sticker in used for the roof of the cabin and on the side panels of the tractor, there is a sticker used to indicate a ladder and the other side is a machinery look.
ve added some pics so you can see relative size to other types of LEGO components.&nbsp
column3: For instance, you can fit a 6 wide (or 8 wide) vehicle in the back wagon with ease.&nbsp
column4: My one gripe with the back wagon is a lack of a tailgate.&nbsp

column1: For a smaller technic set - it has a couple of alright functions on it.
column2: You can use the back gear to swivel the back end of the tractor left and right.&nbsp
column3: Also, there is a dumping mechanism on the wagon.&nbsp
column4: Just by turning the lever on the underside of the wagon, it will tilt up the back and release your cargo.&nbsp
column6: s a nifty contraption that stays at whatever level you want it too.&nbsp
column7: I appreciate the simple, yet effective gear arm usage to achieve this!&nbsp
column8: The top of the cab is easy to remove and you can sit a mini-doll or a mini figure in the cockpit, as there is a miniature seat and steering wheel.&nbsp
column9: Either one will immediately fall off upon movement though.&nbsp
